Direct Known Subclasses:
commChecker
public class gpsdevice
extends Object

Author:
Ali this class constructs objects from the RXTX library which is then extended by the commChecker class

Field Summary
(package private)  Thread gpsThread
          a thread in order to run commChecker class on a separate thread
(package private)  InputStream inputData
          is needed so we can read data from the GPS device that is connected to a serial port.
(package private) static gnu.io.CommPortIdentifier port
          CommPortIdentifier is the main class that controls access to serial ports.
(package private)  gnu.io.SerialPort serialPort
          SerialPort defines the interface to a RS-232 device such as a gps device.

Field Detail

port

static gnu.io.CommPortIdentifier port
CommPortIdentifier is the main class that controls access to serial ports. it negotiates with the driver in order to find out which communication ports are available

serialPort

gnu.io.SerialPort serialPort
SerialPort defines the interface to a RS-232 device such as a gps device.

inputData

InputStream inputData
is needed so we can read data from the GPS device that is connected to a serial port.

a thread in order to run commChecker class on a separate thread
